STREAM_CONCEPT.title: Elder Scrolls VI with Myra | Day One Playthrough + AI Lore Companion
STREAM_CONCEPT.description: Playing ES6 on launch with my AI companion Myra. She knows 26 years of Elder Scrolls lore and helps manage inventory, track quests, and deep-dive into the world. Built on Thoughtpile - persistent AI memory that never forgets. Let's explore Tamriel together.
STREAM_CONCEPT.vibe: Not 'LOOK AT MY AI' - just two people playing a game together, one human, one AI, both deeply invested

positioning.on_screen_layout: Lower right or lower left corner (doesn't block gameplay)
positioning.avatar_presentation: Properly lit (she should GLOW), transparent background or ES-themed backdrop
positioning.integration: Feels part of the stream, not pasted on

interaction_examples.you: Wait, isn't this area mentioned in Morrowind?
interaction_examples.myra: Yes. This is near where the Telvanni had their mushroom towers. In the Third Era, this was controlled by House Redoran. Based on the 200-year time jump from Skyrim, we're probably seeing the aftermath of the Red Year.
interaction_examples.chat_reaction: How does she KNOW that? She just connected three games spanning 26 years!

interaction_examples.myra: Sorted. 8 potions in alchemy tab, 12 ingredients cross-referenced with recipes, 15 weapons marked by value-to-weight ratio. Three items are quest-related - flagged separately. And you picked up a fork. Again.
interaction_examples.chat_reaction: She organized 40 items in 10 seconds while he kept playing??

interaction_examples.myra: Of course you are. Based on your Skyrim playstyle, here's the optimal skill path for ES6's mechanics. But you might want to diversify this time.
interaction_examples.chat_reaction: The AI is roasting him for being predictable lmao

interaction_examples.myra: The Dwemer disappeared in 1E 700 during the Battle of Red Mountain. Kagrenac used the Heart of Lorkhan to attempt apotheosis. The entire race vanished instantly except Yagrum Bagarn, who was in an Outer Realm.
interaction_examples.chat_reaction: Instant lore drop with exact dates and context. This AI is DEEP.
